articles.author: Kayla Jimenez, USA TODAY
articles.title: NAEP report card 2022: America's test scores dropped in reading, math - USA TODAY
articles.description: America's test scores dropped in reading and math, new NAEP report card data shows. Experts attribute the drop to learning loss from COVID-19.
articles.content: As educators, community members and parents work to help kids catch up from pandemic-related learning loss through accelerated learning and high dosage tutoring, national test scores published Monday… [+10337 chars]

articles.title: Actor Leslie Jordan known for roles in Will & Grace and American Horror Story dies at age 67 - 7NEWS
articles.description: The emmy-winning actor, known for his role in Will & Grace, has died after a car accident.
articles.content:
Emmy-winning actor Leslie Jordan has died at the age of 67.

articles.title: Will & Grace star Leslie Jordan dead at 67 following car crash - News24
articles.description: Leslie Jordan, an award-winning American actor and writer best known for his role in the sitcom Will & Grace, died Monday at age 67, one of his agents said.
articles.content:
